wikipedia_page.main: Alexander McGeoch (10 March 1854 – 24 January 1922) was a Scottish footballer, who played for Glasgow Western, Dumbreck and Scotland. McGeoch also played cricket and rugby union.

response: * 10 March – Alex McGeoch (d. 1922), Scotland international in four matches (1876–1877).
During its relatively short time, Dumbreck provided Scotland with one of its early internationalists, Alex McGeoch, who represented Scotland on four occasions.
